This vignette introduces regDIF to the general user by providing common use
cases.

## LASSO regularization for evaluating DIF in 2PL-IRT model.

In this example, the `ida` data were generated to mimic an integrative data analysis. The fastest method is to use sum scores as an observed proxy for the latent variable.
```{r,eval=T,message=F,echo=F}
library(regDIF)
head(ida)
item.data <- regDIF::ida[,1:6]
pred.data <- regDIF::ida[,7:9]
fit <- regDIF(item.data, pred.data, prox.data = rowSums(item.data))
summary(fit)
```
